nodes.text: "Booombaaa Booombaa Bombashella" was a song written by a Gungan master songwriter. It was a number one galactic hit for the Twi'lek entertainer Anj'a, who was active during the Galactic Civil War, and the only release by a non-Human artist to top the charts during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Her performance of the song at the outdoor theater at Vreni Island on the planet Corellia was depicted in the painting Intense Performer.

The only mention of "Booombaaa Booombaa Bombashella" was in the description of the painting Intense Performer, which appeared in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided. The painting and its description are the creation of the player Anj'a, who won a contest in 2010 to have their painting and its history added to the game. In 2014, the song was mentioned in the second installment of Slugthrowers: An Overview of Popular Music and Musicians in a Galaxy Far, Far Away, an article written by Edward M. Erdelac and published on the StarWars.com Blog.
